extension.description: Community Playlists discover Playlists that users have created I do not own any links / I am not responsible for what they provide I Just created a platform so users can easy access playlists all in one location To get your Playlist/list on addon contact us at on twitter @teamxkodi Thanks to midraal / Team BOB for Base
extension.disclaimer: The author of this addon do not host any of the content which is found and have no affiliation with any of the content providers. This addon simply searches websites for content. Use at your own risk!
